title: Hour 1: Broke-lyn Dreams
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. is joined by a stacked lineup of Chris "Mad Dog" Russo, JJ Redick, Jay Williams, and Adrian Wojnarowski with reaction to the Nets' firing of Head Coach Steve Nash and who Brooklyn is eyeing to take his place. Paul Finebaum is here to talk about the first College Football Playoff Rankings and debate with Mad Dog on whether or not they got the rankings right.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Is it fair for Steve Nash to be out as Nets Head Coach?
